definition[0]: to cause someone or something to be in a particular situation
example[0]: Most of the land has now been brought into cultivation.
example[1]: The work brought me into contact with a lot of very interesting people.
definition[1]: to make someone become involved in a discussion or situation
example[2]: The government is trying to bring teachers into the debate on education.
example[3]: There is a danger that this could bring other countries into the war.
